item.title: Cuba Updates: Interior Ministry Says Troops Kill 4 and Wound 6 on Florida Speedboat
item.description:
Border troops engaged in a gunfight near the island nationâ€™s coast, the Cuban Interior Ministry said. Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the United States was investigating but relying on the Cuban government for information.

item.title: U.S. Will Offer Embassy Services in a West Bank Settlement for the First Time
item.description:
Palestinians and Israelis on the right and left all say that the move is a step toward legitimizing the Israeli settlements, which most of the world considers illegal.

item.title: 45 Years After Failed Coup, Spain Declassifies Files About Why It Failed
item.description:
Ending more than four decades of conjecture, the Spanish government moved to publish documents from a long-secret investigation of a failed 1981 coup.
